Augusta-Richmond_County.1998 Masters Tournament: The 1998 Masters Tournament was the 62nd Masters Tournament, held from April 9–12 at Augusta National Golf Club. Mark O'Meara won his first major championship with a 20-foot (6 m) birdie putt on the final hole to win by one stroke over runners-up David Duval and Fred Couples.  He birdied three of the final four holes in a final round 67 (−5).
